content: Using Subdomains Ad-Nauseum Still Works?! Surely Not... Online Advertising By: Richard Baxter January 23, 2008 This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Richard Baxter January 23, 2008 Using Subdomains Ad-Nauseum Still Works?! Surely Not... Online Advertising This YouMoz entry was submitted by one of our community members. The author’s views are entirely their own (excluding an unlikely case of hypnosis) and may not reflect the views of Moz. "Hey guys, look at these Subdomainiacs!" I thought that websites who use endless subdomains to get search results were really old hat--Matt Cutts talked about it here, and I'm pretty sure Vanessa Fox talked about it here. Take a look at this. Talk about owning the search results pages! Looks like Google hasn't quite cleaned up the subdomains issue - and I know if you're super relevant and highly authoritative you will own a lot of results, but all of them?! Wow.. richardbaxterseo Richard Baxter is Founder and Director at SEOgadget.co.uk - a UK based SEO company with a passion for helping people and organisations to succeed in search. Copied!
